entry.title: TheGleep: Created page with "= Development = I write software for a living...and I'm always thinking of things I'd like to write. I'm not nearly as good at actually writing them. Anything listed here ha..."
entry.summary:
Created page with "= Development = I write software for a living...and I'm always thinking of things I'd like to write. I'm not nearly as good at actually writing them. Anything listed here ha..."

New page

= Development =
I write software for a living...and I'm always thinking of things I'd like to write.

I'm not nearly as good at actually writing them.

Anything listed here has at least made the proof-of-concept stage.

At the moment, I plan to release all of my applications as "donationware" for individual users, and bulk-use license for institutions (like schools). Individuals can use my programs all they like. I expect institutions to contact me to arrange reimbursements (I think it's only fair...if you are making money or saving time from my work, I want a piece of the action. I promise to be reasonable!<span style="font-size: smaller; vertical-align: top;">*</span> :)

Pending projects:
* [[Android/Music Tutor | Music Tutor]]


<span style="font-size: smaller; vertical-align: top;">*</span> my definition of reasonable is the only definition which applies.

= Favorites =
[[Android/Andor's Trail | Andor's Trail]] is a great and free game. I like it enough that I've decided to make maps for it.
